from.info: Traded James Wisniewski, 2015 third round pick to Ducks for Rene Bourque, William Karlsson, 2015 second round pick on 2015-03-02

Traded Marian Gaborik to Kings for Matt Frattin, 2014 or 2015 (Ducks option from prior trade) second round pick, 2014 conditional third round pick (if Kings advance to second round of 2014 playoffs) (#63-Dominic Turgeon) on 2014-03-05
Traded Steve Mason to Flyers for Michael Leighton, 2015 third round pick on 4013-04-03
Traded 2014 third round pick (#63-Dominic Turgeon) to Red Wings for 2014 third round pick (#76-Elvis Merzlikins), 2015 third round pick on 2014-06-28

Traded Scott Hartnell to Blue Jackets for R.J. Umberger, 2015 fourth round pick on 2014-06-20

from.info: Traded Jordan Leopold to Wild for Justin Falk, 2015 fifth round pick on 2015-03-02
Traded Matt Frattin to Maple Leafs for Jerry D'Amigo, 2015 conditional seventh round pick on 2014-07-01 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)

to.info: Traded Jordan Leopold to Blue Jackets for 2016 fifth round pick on 2014-11-15
